title: (x) Global Chaos - based on TF Cavalier {Yves}
content:
I realize this logo uses a font that has been altered but I swear I've seen a similar font before. As usual, I can't place it. Anyone?   
   
 ![Chaos](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524125824im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/29111.jpg)
author: denali

comments.content: Well done yet again Yves. Thank you.
